entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:21 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
